author: Kylie Stoppel
title: Kudos to Dialzara
text: We have met with several AI receptionist providers and even entered into a couple of contracts, but ultimately found that their products just couldn’t quite adapt to what we needed and were much more expensive on top of it. Dialzara is by far the best and most user-friendly option we’ve come across. The owner of the company did a zoom call with me and took the time to send a 20-minute follow up video specific to our account to make sure we were comfortable with making our own changes in the future.

author: VICTOR DAVID
title: We started using Dialzara to help…
text:
We started using Dialzara to help manage incoming calls, and it’s been surprisingly easy to set up and adjust. Teaching it, correcting it, and refining how it responds didn’t take much time at all.

What really stood out to me is how realistic it sounds compared to other AI call systems I’ve tested — including some that cost significantly more. It handles real client conversations well, filters out marketing and solicitation calls, and helps keep my day organized instead of constantly interrupting it.

Overall, it’s been a solid tool for managing calls and improving how we handle client communication.

author: Gerardo Silva
title: This is my first time using AI services…
text: This is my first time using AI services and Im glad I did. Dialzara has been awesome, quality answering service  with AI. Recommended.

author: Texcore Construction
title: Dialzara is an impressive system that…
text: Dialzara is an impressive system that has the functionality to meet and exceed our business needs and expectations.  Their business & tech support, namely Adam, has been amazing and second to none.

author: Garrett Mccaffrey Jr
title: It's been a great experience and they…
text: It's been a great experience and they have amazing customer support. I had a few issues on my end, because I am not great with computers, they got it fixed within minutes. It's a great service, I would 100% recommend it for your business.

author: Crncr Auto
title: We LOVE it
text: We LOVE it, Its like set it and forget it. I can load all the questions that we get asked, and have it automated. so easy to work it, And very responsive. The DialZara Support is amazing as well, they've kept in contact and are there every step of the way.

author: Davide C.
title: Very happy so far with the service
text: Very happy so far with the service. The price is right, user interface is very intuitive and easy to navigate and the quality of the interaction with the virtual agent is very good.

author: Bernie Lynch
title: Highly Recommend Dial Zara!
text: Dial Zara was so easy to set up and it is amazing the interaction created between the attendant and the caller.  From a price point perspective, it has tremendous value and has taken on a very labor-intensive part of our businesses.  The call transcript via text and email insures we don't miss calls.

author: Larry Goins
title: DialZara is the best A.I. receptionist I have found!
text:
I have been investing real estate over 35 years. I have bought around 1,000 properties in 12 different states. 
I have tried multiple A.I. agent receptionist for my real estate business and all have failed except Dialzara. Not only is the technology superior to anything else I have found but the support and CS is better than anything else I have experienced. I love it! Not to mention I am now saving over $1,000 a month by cancelling my answering service! Go ahead and sign up for Business Plus. It's the done for you white glove service that will get you up and running in no time. In fact I was live in about an hour.

author: Nick Eardley
title: Fast and responsive
text: They are super responsive and always jump in to save the day! Very happy with my service

author: Robert Haney
title: Awesome Team & Super Helpful Tool
text: DialZara has been amazing! Their team went out of their way to help me, and I really appreciate how responsive and supportive they were. The product itself is solid and it makes managing customer service so much easier. Honestly, I think any business could benefit from using it. Huge thanks to the team for making everything so smooth!

author: Crystal Clear Arizona
title: Dialzara has been an FANTASTIC
text: Dialzara has been an absolute game-changer for me! The platform is incredibly user-friendly, making it easy to navigate and get things done quickly without any hassle. But what really sets Dialzara apart is their exceptional customer service. I've had a few questions along the way, and the support team was always prompt and super helpful in addressing them. I was especially impressed when the creator, Adam, personally stepped in to help me resolve a complication I was having. His dedication to ensuring a smooth experience truly shows how much he cares about his customers. If you're looking for a reliable platform with top-notch support, Dialzara is the way to go!

author: Kelby Steele
title: Dialzara is a gamecharger for our…
text: Dialzara is a gamecharger for our office. We didn't realize how many lost opportunities we had after hours until we implemented Dialzara. We grew our sales by $16,000 in the first months. I highly recommend Dialzara!

author: Marcela Braka
title: 10 out of 10 Service!
text: 10 out of 10! Our CPA firm needed an AI phone receptionist to adapt to our working schedule and assist with client calls on busy days. DialZara has been very helpful and a smooth transition. You are provided an online account to view all call logs and transcriptions/summaries. Adam at DialZara is exceptional and super prompt in answering any questions or concerns we've had! Great service all around, highly recommend!
